entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 9:10 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 9:10 PM PST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
